titleStmt.title: A sermon concerning decencie and order in the church Preached at VVood-Church, in the diocesse of Canterburie, April. 30. 1637. By Edward Boughen parson of Wood-Church.
titleStmt.author: Boughen, Edward, 1587?-1660?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Raworth for I. Cowper, and are to be sold at his shop, at the east end of Saint Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the east end of Saint Pauls Church
